meta.title: Vert.x fall conferences
meta.summary: A lot of Vert.x conferences are planned this fall around the world, here is a quick recap of these events.

meta.title: Vert.x 3.3.2 is released!
meta.summary: We have just released Vert.x 3.3.2, the first bug fix release of Vert.x 3.3.x.

meta.title: Vert.x 3.3.0 is released!
meta.summary: That was a long run â€¦ but here we are. We are very pleased to announce the release of Vert.x 3.3.0!

meta.title: Vertx 3 and Keycloak tutorial
meta.summary: With the upcoming release of Vert.x 3.3 securing your application with Keycloak is even easier than before.

meta.title: Vert.x 3 and Azure cloud platform tutorial
meta.summary: Vert.x 3.2.1 applications can quickly be deployed on Microsoft Azure. Deployment is independent of your build so it is all about configuration.

meta.title: Vert.x 3.2.1 is released!
meta.summary: We are pleased to announce the release of Vert.x 3.2.1!
